i18n.title: React useForm Hook
i18n.description: In this lab, we will be learning how to use the useForm hook in React to create a stateful value from the fields in a form. This will allow us to easily manage the state of our form inputs and update them as needed. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to create and manage forms in React using the useForm hook.

meta.title: Mastering React useForm Hook: Effortless Form Management
meta.description: Discover the power of the React useForm hook to simplify form handling and state management in your web applications.
meta.keywords: useform, react, state management, web development, form management

i18n.title: React useForm 钩子
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将学习如何在 React 中使用 useForm 钩子从表单字段创建有状态值。这将使我们能够轻松管理表单输入的状态并根据需要进行更新。完成本实验后，你将更好地理解如何使用 useForm 钩子在 React 中创建和管理表单。

meta.description: 探索 React useForm 钩子的强大功能，简化你的 Web 应用程序中的表单处理和状态管理。
